meanings.sent1: The fallen tree occludes the path through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The closed door occludes the view of the room.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy cat occludes the warm sunbeam with its body.
meanings.sent4: The thick fog occludes the entire city, hiding it from view.
meanings.sent5: The massive boulder occludes the entrance to the cave, making it impossible to enter.

meanings.sent1: The heavy traffic occludes the flow of vehicles on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The fallen branches occlude the path in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The tangled wires occlude the easy installation of the new device.
meanings.sent4: The huge crowd occludes the view of the stage at the concert.
meanings.sent5: The thick mud occludes the wheels of the stuck car, preventing it from moving.

meanings.sent1: The locked gate occludes entry into the private garden.
meanings.sent2: The security checkpoint occludes unauthorized access to the building.
meanings.sent3: The strong wind occludes the paper airplane's flight path.
meanings.sent4: The high wall occludes the view of the neighboring property.
meanings.sent5: The dense fog occludes visibility, making it hard to see ahead.
